description: New information technology has dramatically reduced the cost of communication and accelerated the outsourcing and offshoring movement that has been going on for some time. This leaves companies pondering questions such as what to do in-house, what to outsource, where to produce, and how to manage a supply chain that usually involves production in multiple countries. This course will study the design and management of global supply chains, with a particular focus on the issues listed above. The course will be highly interactive, using case discussions in most of the classes. The industries covered include shoes and apparel, toys, consumer electronics, food, and auto.
name: GLOBAL SUPPLY CHAIN MGMT
